project.name: |-- 012-grouping
project.description:
Keywords: + Streams + Collectors + groupingBy + multi level maps, mapping
This project includes very simple examples that illustrate how to perform different operations with streams.
GroupingRunner: Illustrates the use of Collectors.groupingBy to perform single-level groupings of streams. There is a sample that performs the grouping with a method reference and another one that is passed a lambda to perform a more complicated classification.
MultiLevelGroupingRunner: Illustrates how to perform multi-level grouping, how to adapt the result of Collectors and how to map the results.
